Name: StarPieceClusterRock
Notes: A small blue crystal that releases some Star Bits or Coins when broken using the Rock power-up. The Star Bits will automatically move towards the player.

Obj_arg0.Name: Item Type
Obj_arg0.Description: The kind of item to spawn.

Obj_arg1.Name: Item Count
Obj_arg1.Description: The number of items to spawn. Default is 4.
